mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, pwd, name, phone, email, zip_num, address_main, address_detail, address_extra, provider, plan_code) values( #{userid}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zip_num}, #{address_main}, #{address_detail}, #{address_extra}, #{provider}, #{plan_code})
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd}, name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, zip_num=#{zip_num}, address_main=#{address_main}, address_detail=#{address_detail}, address_extra=#{address_extra} where userid=#{userid}
UPDATE member SET plan_code=#{param2} WHERE userid=#{param1}
mapper.select: select userid from member where name=#{name} and email=#{email}
